messages.message:
I'm getting an error while trying to build-docker for `app-tasks`  locally:

```Step 11/18 : RUN python -m nltk.downloader -d /usr/local/share/nltk_data punkt
 ---> Running in 85753c4788a1
/usr/bin/python: No module named nltk
The command '/bin/sh -c python -m nltk.downloader -d /usr/local/share/nltk_data punkt' returned a non-zero code: 1```

looking at requirements.txt for this dockerfile, it seems to be listed for installation:

```nltk==3.4.5```

Anyone also getting this error/have any idea what the issue is?

@Aaron Tami are you on the PY37 container? i see it happening there as well â€” default `pip` and `python` point to different things (i think it works fine in the other python version base images). @will it works on _some_ images but not all (`webapp` has the same problem, `apps-server` builds and runs fine though).
was able to do show that consistently with `docker run -it` `gcr.io/instabase-build/container-base-py37:19.11.14.20.32.11 (http://gcr.io/instabase-build/container-base-py37:19.11.14.20.32.11)`
